h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Double-Combed Rooster Blood Location
content: The Double-Combed Rooster Blood Soak can be found in The Webbed Hollow. It is dropped upon defeating The Duskveil boss in Purple Cloud Mountain. This is the chapter's secret area and the video guide below will take you through how you can get to the area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Double-Combed_Rooster_Blood.md', within the main section titled 'Double-Combed Rooster Blood', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Double-Combed Rooster Blood Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Double-Combed Rooster Blood Soak can be found in The Webbed Hollow. It is dropped upon defeating The Duskveil boss in Purple Cloud Mountain. This is the chapter's secret area and the video guide below will take you through how you can get to the area.
